To: Shibu Janardhanan <Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com> >; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Kawttar Nassik <Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com <mailto:Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com> >; Swarovski Festival City <Swarovski.FestivalCity@chalhoub.com <mailto:Swarovski.FestivalCity@chalhoub.com> >; Salwa Al Mamari <Salwa.Almamari@chalhoub.com <mailto:Salwa.Almamari@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Required Documents for permit approval - Swarovski DFC

 

Dear Shibu and Hagop,

 

Good Afternoon,

 

Please assist in sharing the below documents as requested from Mall operations team to approve a permit request for Swarovski DFC.

 

*	Fire Fighting/Fire Alarm (Internal) Contract that mentions the scope of work, service frequency, and expiration date (AFE only)
*	PAR (All Risks Insurance) 
*	TPL (Public Liability Insurance )
*	General Maintenance Contract (AMC for cleaning and minor works)
*	AC Maintenance Contract 

 

Thanks & Regards,

SHARON PINTO​​​​

ASSOCIATE ‑ ADMINISTRATION

REAL EMIRATES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 563 2000

+971045632000
